Bitwise operators in JavaScript

Bitwise operators act on the level of individual bits which allows for fast comparisons and calculations. I’ll be going over a couple of ways to use bitwise opeartors in JavaScript since it’s not entirely clear at first. Some of the examples shown are from various sources which I’ve accumlated over time in which I’m going to elaborate on them. Bitwise AND Return a one if the two bits are both...
